body_html:
@Nothing9x @longdt219 @saria85

It worked for me:
import android.content.res.AssetManager;
import org.tensorflow.contrib.android.TensorFlowInferenceInterface;
private AssetManager assetManager;
private TensorFlowInferenceInterface inferenceInterface;
private static final String MODEL_FILE = "name of the pb file along with extension"
inferenceInterface = new TensorFlowInferenceInterface(getAssets(), MODEL_FILE);

After this you can use the feed run and fetch commands:

inferenceInterface.feed(.....)
inferenceInterface.run(.....)
inferenceInterface.fetch(........)
